title: Service Learning Design and Effect Analysis: Online-Based Social Change Projects

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational Social Studies Education Experience and Digital Literacy
context.additional_context: Strengthening Service-Learning Experiences Through Social Change Projects for Working Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can write a community problem-solving plan by applying five principles of service-learning project design.
Learners can implement 80% or more of the execution process of a service-learning project using online collaboration tools.
Learners can analyze three or more educational effects of service-learning through reflective journaling and compile them into a report.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
